```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(skimr)
library(kableExtra)
library(cowplot)
library(ggcorrplot)
library(beachball)
library(here)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, dpi = 200)
```

## Load Data

```{r}
analysis_data = readRDS(here("cleaned_data.rds"))
```

## Descriptive Statistics
```{r}
descr_stats = analysis_data %>% skim() %>% partition()

descr_stats$logical %>% kable(caption = "Binary Variables") %>% kable_styling(c("responsive", "condensed", "striped"))
descr_stats$factor %>% kable(caption = "Factor Variables") %>% kable_styling(c("responsive", "condensed", "striped"))
descr_stats$numeric %>% kable(caption = "Continuous Variables") %>% kable_styling(c("responsive", "condensed", "striped"))
descr_stats$Date %>% kable(caption = "Date Variables") %>% kable_styling(c("responsive", "condensed", "striped"))
```

## Correlation Matrix
```{r fig.height=7, fig.width=7}
analysis_data %>% select(-c(id)) %>% mutate_all(as.numeric) %>% cor(use = "pairwise.complete.obs") %>% ggcorrplot(p.mat = cor_pmat(.), hc.order = TRUE)
```
